TopicTitle: KVV showing only all magenta picture?

Articles.Content: I installed the KVV(Kronal Vessel Viewer) in 1.1 and it only shows all magenta picture at SPH. Can someone tell is the issue that the KVV is not compatible with KSP 1.1 or that i have installed it wrong? Or another reason?

I guess this has something to do with the different shader framework in Unity 5. Sadly, the mod hasnt been updated since 1.0.4, more than a year ago.

We simply have to hope and wait, i believe.

I had the same problem and was able to make it (almost) work by disabling every option except FSAA. Unfortunately, that leaves me with a background that isn't easy to remove, and for some reason the engines are still colored magenta.

On 2.5.2016 at 6:23 PM, Frank_G said:

I guess this has something to do with the different shader framework in Unity 5. Sadly, the mod hasnt been updated since 1.0.4, more than a year ago.

We simply have to hope and wait, i believe.

Oh. Okey. Thanks!

Ill try that and see what happens.

There is a thread discussing how to fix this over in the plugin development sub-forum:

So, it's being worked on and the person concerned is doing the sensible thing and asking for help...
